name: Frontend Development
description: Focuses on building user interfaces and client-side logic using modern frameworks like React, Angular, and Vue. This category includes topics on React hooks, CSS Flexbox, responsive design, and other client-side technologies.

name: Backend Development
description: Covers server-side programming, including APIs, middleware, authentication, and database interactions with technologies such as Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB. Topics include Node.js performance tips, Express middleware, and RESTful API design.

name: Database
description: Learn about managing and optimizing databases, including document-based databases like MongoDB, relational databases, and working with data through aggregations, indexing, and query optimization.

name: Security
description: Topics in securing web applications, from authentication strategies using JWT to securing APIs, handling CORS, and protecting against common vulnerabilities like SQL Injection, XSS, and CSRF.

name: JavaScript
description: Dive deep into JavaScript fundamentals, including asynchronous programming, Promises, async/await, and best practices for building scalable applications using JavaScript.

name: Full Stack Development
description: Explore topics related to building both the frontend and backend of web applications using technologies like React, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. This includes deploying full-stack MERN applications and integrating APIs.

name: Deployment & DevOps
description: Learn about deploying full-stack applications, continuous integration, and scaling web apps on platforms like AWS, Heroku, or Docker. This includes best practices for deploying MERN applications and managing cloud environments.

name: Mobile Development
description: Build native and cross-platform mobile applications using technologies like Flutter, React Native, and Swift.

name: Machine Learning
description: Explore machine learning concepts, algorithms, and frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, and Scikit-learn.

name: UI/UX Design
description: Focus on user interface design, user experience, prototyping, and tools like Figma, Sketch, and Adobe XD.
